snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo has $35 million on hand, compared with his Republican challenger, Rob Astorino, who has $2.4 million.
abstract: New York State financial disclosures show Gov Andrew M Cuomo has entered final four months of his re-election campaign with $35 million on hand, compared with his Republican challenger Rob Astorino, who has $2.4 million; polls show Cuomo with large lead over Astorino.

byline.contributor: Javier C. Hernández contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo has $35 million on hand, compared with his Republican challenger, Rob Astorino, who has $2.4 million.

headline.main: Cuomo’s Campaign Holds a Wide Lead in Fund-Raising
headline.print_headline: Cuomo’s Campaign Holds a Wide Lead in Fund-Raising

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
